title: Apple CEO’s Compensation Holds Steady at About $74 Million
description: The compensation of Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook held steady at about $74 million in 2025, with most of the package coming in the form of stock awards.

title: Stablecoin Transactions Rose to Record $33 Trillion, Led by USDC
description: Stablecoin transactions reached unprecedented heights last year, buoyed by favorable policy in the US under pro-crypto President Donald Trump.

title: Creators Say Spotify Pays Up to Twice as Much as YouTube for Video Podcasts
description: The Swedish streaming giant is stepping up its courtship of YouTubers as it pushes deeper into video
